beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 6 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name is making|noises head turning|left and right.

beats.text: |VS| Suddenly, a $avatar_t_type heading to $avatar_t_heading swiftly passed next to $hero_name. |VS| ‘Too fast! Did you see that? It was a blur. No legs, just speed. My eyes are spinning, Little man-cub. Everything is rushing to get somewhere else.’

‘Look at that $avatar_t_type. They have round feet! They don't step; they roll. That is how they move so fast without getting tired. Not very sage, if you ask me’ |VS| added $hero_name, nodding their head.

‘Alright. If we want to cross $avatar_street street, we must match the speed. Don't fight the concrete river. Step... step... step. Glide like the crocodile’ |VS| doing long, rushed steps, trying to cross the street.
‘We made it across. Good. My paws prefer the dirt, but the Grey Stream is fast. Let's get off before we get swept away. Let’s find the next page!’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 6  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
